title:
Center manifolds for Random Dynamical Systems with generalized
  trichotomies
authors: Ant\'onio J. G. Bento and Helder Vilarinho
abstract:
For small perturbations of linear Random Dynamical Systems evolving on a
Banach space and exhibiting a generalized form of trichotomy, we prove the
existence of invariant center manifolds, both in continuous and discrete-time.
Furthermore, we provide several illustrative examples.
